categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: In 29 ABY, Yuuzhan Vong former-Executor Nom Anor, disguised as the Prophet Yu'shaa, traveled to the living world of Zonama Sekot along with Jedi Knights Tahiri Veila and Corran Horn, as well as the Yuuzhan Vong priest Harrar and the shaper Nen Yim. However, Anor betrayed them and sabotaged the hyperdrive of the living world of Zonama Sekot, causing massive amounts of energy to build up in the hyperdrive. Despite this, the energy buildup did not result in the devastating explosion Anor wanted, as Zonama Sekot funneled the energy into a blind hyperspace jump.
